question: 急
sourceAnswer: sudden/abrupt/unexpected | urgent/pressing | steep/sharp/precipitous | rapid/swift/fast | emergency/crisis/danger | urgency/hurrying/haste | (in-gagaku-or-noh)-end-of-a-song
sourceMnemonic: This takes its meaning from the <kanji>sudden</kanji> part of the kanji, meaning it's <vocabulary>sudden</vocabulary>, <vocabulary>urgent</vocabulary>, or an <vocabulary>emergency</vocabulary>!
sourceReadingMnemonic: This has the same reading as the kanji you learned, meaning you know the reading!
